name: 蘇春
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意。材料性質、製程與結構之關係、機械基礎 - 彈性行為、塑性基本理論。冶金基礎 - 單晶的塑性變形、差排理論、強化機構、材料的破壞。
Mechanical Fundamentals: Introduction, stress and strain relationships for Elastic Behavior, 
Elements of the theory of Plasticity, etc.. Metallurgical Fundamentals: Plastic Deformation of Single Crystal, Dislocation Theory, Strengthening Mechanism, Fracture, etc..
schedule:
Week 1: 引言 Introduction (1)
Week 2: 變形物理 Physics of Deformation (2)
Week 3: 機械測試與材料特性 Mechanical Testing & Properties of Materials (3)
Week 4: 金屬 / 合金之強化機制 Strengthening Mechanisms in Metals/Alloys (4)
Week 5: 工程材料 Materials in Engineering (5)
Week 6: 應力 - 應變關係及變形模型 Stress-Strain Relations & Deformation Models (6)
Week 7: 彈性及黏彈性 Elasticity & Viscoelasticity (7)
Week 8: 複雜 / 主應力及應變 Complex/Principal Stresses & Strains (8)
Week 9:	期中考 Midterm Exam 
Week 10: 塑性及超塑性 Plasticity & Superplasticity (9)
Week 11: 軸件扭矩 Torsion in Shafts (10)
Week 12: 失效理論及設計 Failures Theories & Design (11)
Week 13: 破裂力學及設計 Fracture Mechanics & Design (12)
Week 14: 材料疲勞行為 Fatigue Behavior of Materials (13)
Week 15: 材料潛變形為 Creep Behavior of Materials (14)
Week 16: 複合材料機械行為 Mechanical Behavior of Composite Materials (15)
Week 17: 複習 Reviews
Week 18: 期末考 Final Exam
materials:
教科書 Textbook:
Mechanical Behavior of Materials, Zainul Huda, Springer, 2022
